DataStructure_jar_Node module

class DataStructure_jar_Node.JarOfNodes

Bases: object

this class is used to store all the nodes in a list attributes:

nodes: a list of nodes

GiveNodeWithCoordinates(x, y)

this function is used to return the node with the given coordinates

Args:

x (float): the x coordinate of the node y (float): the y coordinate of the node

Returns:

node(Node): the node with the given coordinates

Returns:

node(Node): the node with the given ID

Returns:

this function is used to return the nodes in the jar

Returns:

GiveSize()

this function is used to return the size of the jar Returns:
